body.p: Well, I tell you first thing, everybody of Tomah Indians at Wisconsin Dells all o.k. but Scott Mokey’s wife and she awful sick. They are down at Lake Delton where he work at Parson’s trading post. She been pretty sick now for about two weeks. Small Boy, that’s his name and I don’t mean he is little fellow from Black River Falls and he turn car quick and roll car over two three times and break his arm pretty close to elbow and hurt pretty bad. He go way up north and that’s when it happened. Tourists now going pretty good and lot more people than last year. Indians tell reporter that sell more baskets and people don’t say “too much money” every time squaw say basket $1.50. Indian Reporter and Chief Rain-in-the-face Soderstrom fix up rain pretty good last Thursday night. I didn’t talk to him but I put in Indian News about have him beat tom=tom and make rain and paper come out Thursday morning and Thursday night big rain that farmers like. Indian reporter was in Tomah Saturday and two fellows buy me drink for way I fix up rain and tell me next time don’t wait for such long time before fix up rain. I tell them tom-tom right here in Tomah and next time want rain go to Power company place and let him know about it and he fi it up all right, and have big joke and everybody laugh about beat tom-tom and shake rain out of clouds. This two times now we make rain like that and both times farmers need pretty bad. Indian reporter was in Cash Store Saturday and Arnold Schueler like what you call manager of boxing show Friday night at Fair tell me two Indians going to fight in show and one of them Myron Lowe of Black River. He tell me suppose I am going to be here for fight but I have to work at Dells that night and coming to fair Saturday night and broadcast to people that come to fair. People that run fair tell me lot of people want to see Indian reporter that write news in Tomah Journal every week, and I want to see all my friends and have talk to them. Friday night Indian Reporter have joke with people and talk like southerner right in middle of 250 people that come from Louisiana and they laugh and think big joke. That pretty long way to come to Dells. White Bear who is good singer and drummer at Stand Rock have bad news from home at Winnebago, Nebraska and have to go to home today because somebody pretty sick. .
